name: A Grim Tale (DEMO) *UPDATED!*
description:
Wakey, Wakey sleeping beauty!

Welcome to "A Grim Tale" a continuation to "The Grim Stuff". You play as a Character called "Project" and you're called that for a reason. Your goal is to make it across town and meet up with Luther, But the Dreks aren't making it easy! Play the demo of A Grim Tale and navigate through our Sewer level and see if you can make it out of the sewer alive! Playtime is ROUGHLY: 25 - 35 minutes.

*PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS IS THE DEMO OF THE GAME AND YOU MAY EXPERIENCE BUGS AND GLITCHES THAT MAY OR MAY NOT BE PRESENT IN THE FINAL RELEASE. Please report any and all issues to us Via the comment section, Thank you!
